statements: DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE facility_name = 'ABC Inc.' AND temperature_threshold < 20;
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE facility_name = 'Green Eco Facility' AND quality_control_passed = true;
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE temperature_threshold < 25 AND humidity_threshold > 60 AND quality_control_passed = false
DELETE FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE facility_id = 10 AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE qc_id = 12345 AND facility_name = 'Facility A'
DELETE FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE facility_id = 54321 AND capacity < 500
DELETE FROM OperationsLogs WHERE facility_id = 2001 AND action = 'Maintenance';
DELETE FROM BiodegradableWaste WHERE facility_id = 1 AND weight > 1000;
DELETE FROM OperationsLogs WHERE facility_id = 2 AND operation_date < '2022-01-01';
